translations: 二进制数字（Binary digits）；后台智能传输服务（Background Intelligent Transfer Service）；建设集成时序供应（Building Integrated Timing Supply）

phrs.translation: n. [美口]二角五分；廉价之物；不重要的东西

sentences.sentence: The book fell to bits in my hands.
sentences.translation: 那本书在我手中成了碎片。

sentences.sentence: I love my kids to bits.
